block.p: LOWE'S COS., Wilkesboro, N.C., named Robert A. Niblock, senior vice president for finance, to the post of chief financial officer. He succeeds Thomas E. Whiddon, who was named to the new post of executive vice president for logistics and technology.

STORAGE TECHNOLOGY CORP., Louisville, Colo., named Patrick J. Martin chairman, president and chief executive, succeeding David E. Weiss, who is retiring. Mr. Martin had been president for the North American Solutions Group at Xerox.

LOWE'S COS., Wilkesboro, N.C., named Robert A. Niblock, senior vice president for finance, to the post of chief financial officer. He succeeds Thomas E. Whiddon, who was named to the new post of executive vice president for logistics and technology.

STORAGE TECHNOLOGY CORP., Louisville, Colo., named Patrick J. Martin chairman, president and chief executive, succeeding David E. Weiss, who is retiring. Mr. Martin had been president for the North American Solutions Group at Xerox.

TEXTRON, Providence, R.I., named Sam Licavoli, chief executive at its automotive business, to the posts of chairman and chief executive at its industrial products group. He succeeds Frank Feraco, who is leaving.
